explanation: Go off: If an alarm, etc. goes off, it makes a sudden loud noise
task: I had just fallen asleep when the alarm went ...

explanation:
Go along with: To agree with somebody/something
Go on: continue
Go off: explode a fire

set up = establish
turn over = (of an engine) start or continue to run
put down = put an end to
task: The strike was ... by military units.

explanation:
Buildings and people can be tall, most other things are high (planes, mountains, ceilings, etc.)
These choices are one syllable adjectives, we add est
S + V + the + adj/adv + est + noun/pronoun
task: It's the ... building in the city
